casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Stephanie BRIDGES 70P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2018 Mr. Durwin P. Jones, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. Andrew Nelson, Attorney at Law, for Bridges, Stephanie Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of April 2018 by State of NC to Deem Its Response as Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of June 2018."
